name: WeaponsTurn3
commands: First is the sword. Both you and Senya can use the sword.
Next is the lance. Only you can use the spear among the party.
Last is the axe. Only Senya can use axes among the party.

The 3 types of weapons I gave you are all melee weapons.|This means that you must stand next to an enemy to use it.|These 3 weapons balance against each other in a 'weapon triangle'.|Think of it like rock paper scissors if you're familiar.|Swords beat axes, lances beat swords, axes beat lances.|If you're in a winnning matchup, you'll do bonus damage and have a higher hit rate.|The opposite is true for losing matchups.

Bows on the other hand must be used from 2 range AKA 2 tiles from an enemy.|Bows are completely separated from the weapon triangle.|Only Senya can use bow>|All of the weapons I've given you do physical damage.|This means they use the user's strength + the weapon - enemy's defense.

I've asked a guards to act as dummies for you to practice on.|Go as hard as you want on him, you won't really kill them.|Practice looking at the preview screen before you initiate a battle.|Next turn I'll teach you about magic for Schuri.
